Reviews.Title: This alarm works the way it's described
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: I've had this alarm for 2 months now and just ordered a second for the back door.  The door alarm is VERY loud and piercing.  I would think a burglar would not bother entering a home if this alarm was set off.  If you want to use the Home mode (so that it sounds off right away when the door is opened), you have a choice of selecting "chime" or "alarm."  For the Home mode using "alarm" you do have to activate it with your 4 digit code but you do not need to punch in your code if you're using "chime" for Home mode.When you set it to "Away" mode, you just need to enter your 4 digit code and leave within 45 seconds.  When you come home, you have 30 seconds to enter your code to deactivate the alarm.

Reviews.Title: Great product does exactly what it says.  Recommended.
Reviews.Author: Davio
Reviews.Content: I have three of these.  One is used as an instant on alarm for a door that nobody is supposed to EVER open.  The alarm is LOUD AS THE DICKENS !!!  I mean LOUD LOUD ear hurting loud.  That's a good thing.The other two are used as door chimes for every time a door opens (in our case at our place of business).Th unit comes with both screws and double-sided pressure sensitive tape.  Installation is a snap.  They will mount on either side of the door, too.  Setting your 4 digit code is also a no-brainer:  hit the learn button, then enter your 4 numbers on the keypad.  See the green light.  You're done.If anybody has a problem with this thing, then they are expecting it to be something it is not.  Oh, of course it has batteries.  And they are not included.  So get some and quit whining.For what it does, it does it well... and for a peanuts price, too.  HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

Reviews.Title: good purchase
Reviews.Author: dee marie
Reviews.Content: this item does exactly what it says it does. the area i live in was having a rash of break ins mid day. my husband and i live in a 3 story colonial. it is hard enough to hear whats going on on other floors but add in daily life like tv, air conditioners, fans and music and you cant hear at all. when we are home during the day we set the alarm to chime and it lets us know if our door opens, from every floor. at night we set it to home so that if an intruder enters we will hear them. during the day when we are at work it is set to away to alert my neighbors if anyone tries to enter our home. you can not simply take out the batteries as another review stated ... you need a screwdriver to do so. and with the sheer volume of the sound that is outputted by the alarm, anyone would run from the home, thinking it was connected to a company. deffinatly worth the investment. we have put one on our basement door as well, to alert us if that door opens since we do not go down there very often.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for...
Reviews.Author: Matty217 "truth seeker"
Reviews.Content: This alarm had a quick easy setup, i had it up and going in less than five minutes.  Followed the instructions which said to switch it to Chime mode to test that you had the keypad and door piece aligned correctly....i did, i was so happy a quick easy setup and an alarm that work for less than $20!  So i showed my wife how to work the alarm, she set it and opened the door faster than I had...but to my dismay the alarm didn't register...turns out if you open the door really fast the alarm does not register!  I tried this on three doors and got the same result everytime and the alarm was set up correctly.  If someone breaks in don't you think there's a chance they may open the door quickly???  Avoid this...you really do get what you pay for and mine is now in the garbage.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Sue
Reviews.Content: Oddly We have had this guy stop by our home and want to buy our motorhome twice in the last yearNOTE:  there is NO for sale sign on itHe showed up last week as I was leaving for work, after I left i called my husband I said something is strangethe way our property sits our motor home is like 200 feet away from houseso I ordered this product and waited it's arrivalWell just Yesterday 09/02/2011  we intalled this wireless alarm in our motor home3:30 am  my daughter woke us and said there is a loud alarm going off out backI was thinking to myself this better not be false alarmNOPE, someone broke into the motor home and when the arlarm sounded they were gonein a hurry even dropping there flashlight and one had taken the gas cap off there had to be two of themBUT you could hear this alarm screaming all the way to the houseGood investment  now I am purchasing Motion sensors and I hope I get as good of luckI feel sorry for the bastard when I get himSignedArmed

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Sandra Abel
Reviews.Content: If you're a merchant or a parent or anyone else looking for a simple alarm to let you know when a door is opened, this is a very good device.  You can switch between a ding-dong alert for when you're in the room and a screaming siren when you want it as an intrusion alarm.I had previously installed a similar alarm from First Alert.  The problem with those is that they use hearing aid batteries which run down quickly and cost nearly $10 to replace.  This GE alarm has more functionality and uses longer-lived and less costly to replace AAA batteries.The only thing that prevented me from giving this alarm five stars is that I had to replace it after it failed after less than a year of use -- one of the control switches on the alarm failed.

Reviews.Title: Reliable
Reviews.Author: Lynn Benson
Reviews.Content: I am using my alarm as much to know if someone is coming IN as OUT.  I have small children and you can't be too careful.  I have my alarm set to chime whenever the door is opened.  And it works like a dream.  It's sufficiently loud for me to hear in my small house, even with a tv on.  When we leave the door open (bringing in the groceries)it's nice that the door doesn't keep chiming.  I honestly haven't set it to the alarm mode, so I can't comment on that.

Reviews.Title: Loud. But is it secure?
Reviews.Author: K. Fraz Ahmed
Reviews.Content: There's only so much you can expect from a stand-alone wireless door alarm device. Is it loud enough to wake you and your neighborhood. Yes, That it is. and just judging from the intensity and volume, it can be quite the deterrent. The alarm is easy enough to install, though the keypad being only 4 buttons only leaves you with enough combinations, but in the nick of things it should prove to be enough. Its easy enough to set up, the magnet can be screwed or stuck on with included double sided tape. However it also depends on what kind of door jam and border you have. My door jam had a rounded bezel at the edge which meant i had to either stick it on the rounded edge which wasn't very stable, or stick it a little farther away where it was flatter, only problem is then it wouldn't work because the magnet has to be less than half an inch from the edge of the alarm.Aside from those issues, the alarm does what it's supposed to. that is make a very loud noise. It has delayed alarm settings which gives you 45 sec from when you arm it, and enough time to leave the house. and 30 seconds when you re-enter to punch in the code before it goes off. So simple enough interface, works in instant mode as well, for when you're at home. and someone enters, the alarm goes of instantly with no delay. This instant mode can be switched to a door chime mode as well. but it is really loud even in door chime mode, and it does not come with a volume adjuster.Being standalone battery operated, the battery is rated to last a few months before it needs replacement. it will begin flashing when its running low. Also its small form factor allows it to be placed anywhere. I would recommended placing the alarm at an odd place where it would still work when the door is opened, but not be in the usual place where anyone can see or expect it easily.For those who cant afford a security subscription service, this works quite well as a basic deterrence. Within seconds of a break in it will blast a sound around 120db waking anyone in the vicinity, especially if its an apartment building, leaving the intruder no choice but to flee immediately. And that could be the difference.UPDATE: I've used this device for 2 years now, and only replaced the battery once very recently. So take form that what you will.

Reviews.Title: GE Alarm
Reviews.Author: THOMAS PACHECO
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, however there is no indicator light to remind you that the Alarm is on. It would be nice to physically see the alarm is on.Could be a little louder.

Reviews.Title: LOUD alarm!!!
Reviews.Author: Military Momma "Carolyn"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this primarily to alert us when our daughter opens the door.  The door knob we have is a handle/latch type knob.  Due to the type of mechanism involved with the dead bolt, when the door is opened from the inside, the deadbolt will open as well.  This is not ideal when you have a 1 year old who can reach the door handle and run out to the street in seconds.  It took me just a few minutes to install.  I opted for the double sided tape because we live in military family housing and will have to pay for "damaging" the door.The chime is pretty loud, I can hear it all over the house although it might be difficult if you had a second floor or are in the shower.  The alarm is no joke, nearly scared me to death!  It will be great to keep pesky housing maintenance people out of my home when i'm not there.  Definitely loud enough to scare away an intruder.The lid to the battery compartment does require a tiny screw driver to open and close.  This is great because if an intruder comes in and wants to just remove the batteries he can't.  He'd pretty much have to smash it to turn it off.I also like that the magnet for the alarm can be on either side of the main unit.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the money
Reviews.Author: Derek A. Wade "Derek A. Coach Wade"
Reviews.Content: Let's be honest, this isn't an ADT monitored alarm system. It's a simple deterrent for the novice thief. I've read some truly ridiculous complaints about this thing.I got mine as part of a home security kit including three window alarms. Each item works flawlessly as designed.If there is molding around the door, the sensor or the magnet will be at a strange angle. This has no affect on operation. It's purely aesthetic. I simply mounted the alarm unit to the door itself and the magnet is on the door frame (molding).Yes, a thief could yank this off the door, smash it on the ground, and make off with your TV. However, you are completely overlooking that the thief has no way of knowing what type of alarm system you have. When he hears the alarm go off, all he's going to be thinking is, "Oh no!" He has no way of knowing whether or not your alarm is monitored. (ProTip: run a search for 'monitored alarm sign' here on Amazon. You'll find signs ranging from $3.95 to $20 that will indicate that your home alarm is monitored. When the siren goes off, the thief is not going to hang around to discover that your sign is lying!)Some people have also complained about the thirty second disarm time "Giving the burglar time to find and destroy the alarm." Thirty seconds is the industry standard for such alarm modules, and odds are once he hears the reminder beep, he's going to be hightailing it, especially if he thinks the alarm is being monitored.I had the alarm unpackaged, code set, and installed within ten minutes. It took me longer to find a screwdriver to get into the battery compartment. (The battery compartment is sealed to prevent a thief from yanking out the batteries to silence the alarm.)Let's be honest, folks, alarm systems will only deter the average thief. An expert homebreaker will be in and out of your house in a few minutes, bypassing or ignoring even the best alarms. But that's not what we're trying to do here. You're trying to use a simple sonic deterrent to scare away the rookie thief.This will do it.

Reviews.Title: GE wireless door alarm system...
Reviews.Author: mel taylor
Reviews.Content: I recently bought two of these alarms for my front and back door.The product is exceptional for the price.It is easy to install and easy to set up.I really feel safe when I leave the house, or even when I am IN the house.I used to have one that, after awhile, stopped taking my code.Needless to say, THAT was embarrassing when the neighbors would come out to see what was going on.

Reviews.Title: Very loud alarm !!! Make it remote.
Reviews.Author: My 2 cent's
Reviews.Content: This alarm is high pitched and loud! i like it because once it is tripped you need to put in your 4 number code to unarm it. you can't just close the door to make it stop alarming. also it uses 3 AAA batterys. not those button cells that can be expensive hard to find and not last as long. and i like the price. it has instant on and delay and chime. it is so loud [it sounds like a high priced alarm ] that i would think a intruder would leave thinking it is a wireless company alarm linked to a system and the police may be on their way!!! most new alarms are wireless. you can make this alarm portable so you can move it from room to room, just use velcro to mount it. screws and double sided foam tape are included. make it remote with string. set this alarm close to a door or far away on a chair, shelf or table. tie string to alarm magnet and run string to door handle or whatever you want to protect when it is moved it pulls string and alarm goes off. it gives you a secure feeling knowing that you have something to warn you that if someone breaks in you will be alerted. if you are sleeping the last thing you want is to have someone break in and you are still sound asleep!!!!  it's a great alarm that can be used many ways.

Reviews.Title: Performs as Advertises
Reviews.Author: MJB
Reviews.Content: This item does exactly what it said it would.  I mounted one on each of three exterior metal doors as illustrated in the accompanying instructions.  All it took was a pencil, electric drill, and screwdriver to get it right the first time.  I recommend mounting the door jamb magnet first and then the alarm unit that goes on the door.  About eye height seems best.  The alarm loudness is sufficient to awaken anyone in the house if the door is forced open from the outside.  It will also awaken the whole house if you forget to deactivate it before opening the door.  Setting the disabling code was simple, and the code system works great.  The items were received four days after ordering and paying by PayPal.  It operates on three AAA batteries which allegedly will last for months, so operating costs are practically nil.

Reviews.Title: Not the perfect solution for me - protecting a child's room
Reviews.Author: Bill C "Foothillsco"
Reviews.Content: I just installed this and it let me explain my usage.I have a 2 year old child in a room 40 ft from my room.  I want an alarm that goes off if her door is opened by someone that isn't me, or by her.If you set it to chime, it's ok if I'm awake but I could sleep through it.If you set it to alarm, it will wake you up, which I want it to do.If you set it to alarm, and home, it goes off instantly.  You can't set, and leave thru the door.If you set it to alarm, and away, it goes off on a countdown.  You can set, and leave thru the door.But...In my usage, it is installed inside her room.  If it were installed outside the room, it could easily be disabled by someone with bad intentions.From inside her room, I set the alarm to away, enter the code to arm the alarm, open the door, exit close the door.  If an intruder were to open the door, it makes a beep.  It then goes to a 45 second countdown before the alarm goes off.  The intruder has a window to disable the alarm.  You could easily crush this with your boot, drop it in water, muffle it possibly.  Either way, if someone knows of this alarm, or can think quickly, it will never go off.The other reason this isn't for me - say I want to enter her room to check on her while she is sleeping, while it's armed.  I open the door, close the door, press the disarm code.  Pressing these buttons is pretty loud and wakes her up and anyone in a room nearby.What I have learned is I need an alarm that goes off in my bedroom or wherever I happen to be in the house.This review isn't critical of the product, just merely stating I bought the wrong produce for my needs.  I'm replacing this with this:http://www.amazon.com/45142-Choice-Alert-Wireless-Control-Center/dp/B0013V1T2I/ref=pd_bxgy_hi_text_c7This item will let me arm it or disarm it remotely.  I can set it to instantly go off without the countdown by keeping it on home, instead of away.and thishttp://www.amazon.com/45138-Choice-Alert-Wireless-Signal-Repeater/dp/B0013V58QG/ref=pd_sim_hi_5

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted..........
Reviews.Author: Tolefairy
Reviews.Content: Items were shipped promptly (I ordered two) and were exactly what I wanted. The alarm is very loud. It will, at the very least, be a good deterrent. My daughters house was broken into the day after Thanksgiving. They came in through the back yard and even though there was a big dog in the yard, they used a big shovel to hit the dog and tear off the back door. The horror of it is, is that my 12 year old grandson was asleep in one of the bedrooms with the door closed. My daughter was at work and the dad had gone to run some errands. They stole two flat screen TV's and went into the bedroom where my grandson was sleeping. We assume  they saw him there and did not take his TV, but ran.This happened around noon, in broad daylight.I believe, if my daughter had had this type of door alarm, my grandson AND the neighbors would have heard it. And yes, she is ordering some of these for her doors.

Reviews.Title: Makes me feel more secure
Reviews.Author: AG "Mac lover"
Reviews.Content: Having these alarms on my first floor door in midtown Atlanta help me to sleep better at night. But you better watch out, if it's armed on "Home" and you open the door, it WILL deafen you. I think my ears hurt for days. So now I'm a little scared to open my doors but... hopefully intruders will be too. And I'm positive I'd hear it from the third floor.

Reviews.Title: This alarm is extremely loud
Reviews.Author: Derryl
Reviews.Content: I purchased this alarm as a supplement to my apartment's wireless alarm system. It's very easy to install, very easy to set up the passcode, and very easy to use. In the "away" mode, you have 30 seconds to disarm the alarm. In the "home" mode, the alarm sounds instantly if an intruder comes in uninvited. As the packaging states, it requires 3 AAA batteries. It's EXTREMELY loud and should act as an effective deterrent. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Loud
Reviews.Author: Mark Wagner "MW"
Reviews.Content: This thing is great. I like how you can make your own 4 diget code for turning it on and off, and it is loud as hell

Reviews.Title: No indicator to tell you alarm is set
Reviews.Author: jem04 "jem04"
Reviews.Content: This product works well and is loud, however there is no light indicator to tell you if the alarm has been set.  On several occasions I have opened the door not knowing if the alarm has been set and the piercing alarm is unavoidable.  Even when I set the alarm, I am not confiedent that it truly set because there is no indication to tell you.  For these reasons, the product is useless.

Reviews.Title: not so much
Reviews.Author: SusieQ
Reviews.Content: The loudness of this door alarm is very, very, very loud but it's not easy to turn off with the code.  Even with the correct code and it still may not turn off.

Reviews.Title: A Workable and inexpensive solution
Reviews.Author: Cindy Shaver
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my basement door - to keep my teenagers from sneaking people in/out through the basement door.  It works - cheap and easy to install and you can easily hear the alarm go off from three floors up.  I worried that my teens would try to disable by removing the batteries, but if they try, the alarm goes off and the it takes time to get the batteries out (the battery panel is screwed on - so you have to take the screw out while the alarm is sounding).  We just check it every few days to make sure nobody has tampered with it.  It does the job - oh the joy of raising teenagers...

Reviews.Title: Great for sliding patio door - Easy to use!
Reviews.Author: Kat
Reviews.Content: We wanted this for a sliding patio door that led to our backyard.  More to keep track of kids, than for a burglar alarm because we also have one of those for the entire house. This has worked perfectly.  Easy to install, simple to operate.  I can hear the alarm in any part of the house, but it doesn't pierce my ears, so maybe it's the setting my husband put it on.(Update: we have it on CHIME mode.  With that mode, it is loud but not piercing.  Also, with the chime mode which is on the right side of the unit, you don't have to set and reset the alarm code.  If you open the door, alarm chime goes off, but then it stops.  It just lets you know when somebody is going through the door.  If you set it on ALARM mode, you will have to set the code and unset it each time if you don't want it going off, so I suggest you use this if you want it as a burlgar alarm and the chime mode if you simply want to know if the door is being opened.  Hope that makes sense)He put the largest part on the slider, the smaller part on the jam.  It doesn't need wiring; that was a PLUS!  Then he set the alarm mode, the code, showed me how to use it and it really is that simple.No, it doesn't keep anybody inside from unlocking the door and going out, but at least I know if somebody is trying to go outside.  It won't keep anybody from breaking in.  They can break the door and come in.  It's an alarm.  It goes off and lets you know the door has been opened.  It isn't loud enough to summon all the neighbors, so if you aren't home, it won't help except maybe a burglar would get scared and run.  If you are home, at least you should hear the noise and know it.To me, that's what it was made for and it has worked perfectly.  Just bought a second one for our garage door into the house.

Reviews.Title: Overall, a great purchase for peace of mind
Reviews.Author: T. Fairlee
Reviews.Content: This product is VERY loud and, overall, a great purchase. I came on here fully prepared to give this product a 5 star rating, but then I read the review by Daryl Gates, who makes an excellent point! This alarm makes a loud beep when the door has been opened on "away" mode, which is meant to alert to the owner that you have 30 seconds to put in the code before the alarm goes off. However, if someone were breaking in, that would alert them that there was an alarm on the door and, it being a small plastic product, it could very easily be removed and completely disabled before the 30 seconds was up and the alarm sounded. TOO BAD. Otherwise, this product is leaps and bounds better than the last door alarm that we had and would definitely wake us up out of a dead sleep if someone were to break into our house in the middle of the night. When it is on "home" mode, it goes off the second the door is opened, and therefore I'm still very pleased with my purchase. I'm much more worried about the safety of my family than the security of my belongings, so if it were on "away" mode, that would mean we were all gone and my family would be safe from anyone with bad intentions. (Besides, we usually leave through the garage door - on which we use one of the more basic GE door alarms, so leaving it on "home" mode 100% of the time, is a perfectly reasonable option for us.) This product is well worth the small price tag for the peace of mind - and the break in homeowners insurance! ;D

Reviews.Title: FATAL FLAW!
Reviews.Author: Daryl Gates
Reviews.Content: I had an old wired version of this alarm that was about six years old, the buttons were starting to stick so I bought this updated version.  To my surprise, after setting the alarm, I came home and opened my door and instantly heard a LOUD BEEP in which I then had 30 seconds to turn off the alarm... the old version did not have this beep.  Now if an intruder breaks in and opens the door, he will be pleasantly rewarded with a beep to notify him that I have door alarm up high on my door frame (out of sight of eyeline) so that he can remove it, smash it or bury the alarm noise under a pillow or something.  HORRIBLE design flaw!

Reviews.Title: It's pretty good
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: I like it. I use it on a door in the shed as a way to keep people from entering it unauthorized. It works well even in the cold temps and I'm thoroughly impressed with the unit.1. Just install your batteries "which the cover is kept in place by a screw, so nobody can open it"2. Press the "learn" button inside the battery compartment, then enter your 4 digit code that you choose.3. Replace the cover.4. Apply the double sided 3M Tape and stick the back unit to the door or door jamb. Which ever you choose.5. Stick the magnet up next to it.and you're done!

Reviews.Title: great but needs sound options
Reviews.Author: the webbing planner
Reviews.Content: it works amazingly well! quality is great! perfect price.installed by myself (yes, i am proud of it :) ) in like 5 minutes.i just used the tape, no drilling required. (great option if you dont want to ruin your door & jambs)holds pretty well, even if it was not drilled.works well, even with thick decorative door jambs, as it allows you a max  .5" gap.great sound alarm- loud enough to scare burglars.loved the chime sound, loud enough for you to hear when someone comes in, even when youare in the 2nd floor.the problem is, i think the chime was a bit too loud. (good for stores maybe, but not for homes?)it does not have an "off" button.i like the loudness though because it is not very "alarming" enough to disturb neighbors.but my husband hated the loud chime, as his home office is right by the door-luckily, it has like a clip that makes it convenient to take the main alarm box out-and still put it back on.NOTE to manufacturer:need option for chime volume or "off" modeother than that, it would have been 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: 5 Star Item
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: I just installed 2 of these alarms at my daughters house.  They both work like a charm, and if a door is opened when armed... she will definitely hear it. Easy to set-up and its 2" x 3" size makes it simple to install.  And for people with toddlers, the chime feature will give some peace of mind when your eyes are not on your child.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly!
Reviews.Author: John D. Wagner
Reviews.Content: Just got this system today and had it set up within 15 minutes. Of course I had to hear how loud the alarm was because a previous one (different brand) could barely be heard upstairs. This one can probably be heard down the block and I was wondering if someone was going to call the police. And it truly scared the poop out of my dog. Hopefully the alarm won't go off much!

Reviews.Title: Easy, loud
Reviews.Author: Marci
Reviews.Content: I had my dad help me install four of these. We set one off and my dad forgot what I told him the code was. It was really loud. He said if he broke into a house and heard that he'd leave just because it'd be impossible to stay in the house with such loud noise. I have figured out that if you cover the speaker with your palm it significantly reduces the noise. But I think I would still hear it. And who is going to think that fast anyway? Worth the money. More than worth it.

Reviews.Title: Great for keeping unscrupulous landlords out!
Reviews.Author: A. Sayre "lone ranger"
Reviews.Content: We got this alarm for our safety but also because we were pretty sure our landlord was coming in without notice whilst we were gone.The alarm works great! It is extremely loud. I know this because sometimes I come inside and forget to turn it off. That would be my only beef with the product- it only chirps once when you open the door. I've had alarms before which constantly buzz or chirp to signal your entry.Other than that, the alarm is very easy to install and replace the batteries on. I would highly recommend it for renters who cannot have a wired alarm.

Reviews.Title: alarm success
Reviews.Author: sue reader
Reviews.Content: I have these alarms on three outside doors and they are very effective.  The alarm is plenty loud enough to keep anyone from wanting to enter the home and loud enough to wake you from sleep should it go off during the night.  Probably the best you could find for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great little alarm !
Reviews.Author: Danny Hively
Reviews.Content: I bought this alarm more to keep kids in than out.  T%hese alarms are REALLY LOUD !  I purposely set one off so that the kids could hear what they sound like, and now they don't dare go out without asking.  As a precaution, I put them on at night then take them off in the morning, so that they won't be able to "try to figure them out".  Love it !

Reviews.Title: Device Permanently Failed After 5 Months
Reviews.Author: linda montas
Reviews.Content: This is a simple alarm.  You set a four digit code and then activate or deactivate it using that code.  After 5 months, I deactivated the alarm using the code but the alarm went off anyway.  Repeated attempts to enter the code failed.  Finally, had to unscrew back panel and remove batteries. I then reset the code.  This worked for one day, and then failed again. I have been unable to reset it since.  Called GE and they were of no help whatsoever.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: despond "eig"
Reviews.Content: The alarm works well. Easy to install. Just be very careful in the alignment of both pieces. I had trouble making the alarm work (the chime worked well) and I had to move the parts until both aligned well. As others have stated, the alarm is VERY loud.

Reviews.Title: just ok
Reviews.Author: mc "m"
Reviews.Content: when installing, i found that the two pieces needed to be placed DIRECTLY next to each other with NO gap in order to get the chime to activate- anymore than 1/8" gap and the alarm would not activate.  Even then, the chime did not go off consistently each time.  it was impossible to install in this manner so i found a workaround...go to the hardware store and buy a regular old magnet and use that instead of the small piece that comes with the alarm.  i found the larger magnet did not need to be installed directly next to the contact, and also improved the consistency to where it will chime EVERY time.one criticism- there is no way to know if the alarm is armed or disarmed.  an indicator light would have been helpful.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I was looking for!
Reviews.Author: LizCreamer
Reviews.Content: Not only is the alarm so loud it will wake up the entire neighborhood, the door chime is perfect!  I love this!  It was so easy to install!  I did it myself in about 5 minutes, including setting the code.  I liked it so much I ordered 2 more!This little gadget gave me back my peace of mind.  It's perfect for me.

Reviews.Title: Needs a notice light
Reviews.Author: Brentn
Reviews.Content: This product is great for our home, but I would ask that there be a notice light that would blink or something like it to let you know that the alarm is set.

Reviews.Title: Loud and I love it!
Reviews.Author: K. Bailey
Reviews.Content: I am half deaf (only able to hear in one ear due to childhood ear infections destroying the inner ear of my right ear) so sleeping at night with two small kids in the home gave me severe anxiety. If I was laying on my left ear I was worried I wouldn't hear if someone was in the house. I have been working to overcome the fear but I soon realized I needed some sense of security. Does this alarm call the cops? no. But will it kill your ears if you set it off? Definitely. I can sleep soundly at night knowing there is no way I can mistake a squirrel on the roof as an intruder now. I installed this system in about 10 minutes and have slept better in the past two nights than I have in probably a year.

Reviews.Title: If this ever goes off in the middle of the night you will crap your pants!
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Let me tell you something, you may be asking if this product is loud enough to alert you of an intruder, I will tell you that this is enough to make you want to jump out the window if it ever goes off because you wont want to walk up to it to turn it off!For the price I have never used a better product. Simple to install, easier to use, it far exceeds my expectations.

Reviews.Title: serves the purpose
Reviews.Author: Elliot "edubuu"
Reviews.Content: This serves its intended purpose well.  My only issues with it:  the main unit hangs loosely on the door because the bracket only hold the top.  This allows the unit to "swing" at the bottom where it has a little plastic bump.  I used double-sided tape to try to secure that better.  The screws that come with it for the unit and mount are a joke.  Very tiny flat head opening that strips way too easily, even with the correct screwdriver head.  This means I had to use the included double-sided tape to attach it, even though I'd rather use screws.  The holes for the screws in the unit are too small for most homeowner on-hand screws, and I didn't want to drill out the openings in the plastic more.  My reducing it to 4-stars is solely because of the peripheral issues and not the alarm itself.  It chimes as it's supposed to and blasts as it's supposed to.  I hope I never get to find out if it really will scare someone away who breaks open that door.

Reviews.Title: 5 stars is not enough
Reviews.Author: Haider
Reviews.Content: Its an awesome product. dose exactly what we need it do. cheap and effective. I highly recommended it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Good but Not Good
Reviews.Author: ChloeBear
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed in this buy. It works very well but you have to have doors that don't have frames. But over all a great producted. :)

Reviews.Title: Amazons perfect little alarm
Reviews.Author: R. Sandvig
Reviews.Content: At the price I paid for this item, I really wasn't expecting much out of it. I was delightfully surprised. Not only has it never failed to work, but if I forget the code it lets me enter a new one anytime I like.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: john lang
Reviews.Content: ive been using two of these for about a year now with no problems except when i forget to disarm it before opening the door in the morning , the siren is absolutly defening and very capable of waking up even the neighbors , has a immediate alarm setting , and a delay for setting when you leave  , outstanding product !

Reviews.Title: Too Loud!
Reviews.Author: Jayden17 "JD"
Reviews.Content: We bought 2 of these units for an application in a group home. We actually had to return them due to them being too loud and disturbing the residents. If you're going for LOUD - such as in a security type application - then these are for you. If you just want something that will notify you when a door is opened, these may be too loud. I guess louder is better which is why I still gave them 5 stars - they just didn't work for us. Besides the decibels, they install and work as described - no issues.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install, program and it is loud
Reviews.Author: Gnome DePlume
Reviews.Content: I like that you can mount the magnet on either side of the unit and that both sides have switches for home and away.  You will need a small phillips head driver to open the screw in the back to install the three AA batteries, which are NOT included.  Mounting was simply driving four phillips head screws into the door and doorjamb.  I would strongly recommend pilot holes in that the screws are soft metal and long and that means either ripping the head up or torquing the top of the screws off if you have hard wood.  If you are installing on metal or vinyl then you could use the included double-sided adhesive tape.  Programming directions are clear and simple.  The alarm when activated is both piercing and loud.  There is no way that you will sleep through this and I would think it is enough to scare away an intruder, if they are inclined to be scared away.  The device will blink when the battery runs low but I would mark my calendar to replace the batteries annually anyway.  An alarm without batteries is as useless as a spare tire that has not been checked for air pressure... you have checked your spare tire recently, haven't you?

Reviews.Title: A good & cheap way to add security
Reviews.Author: MinnieWinnie
Reviews.Content: I like this security door alarm...I did read some reviews saying audio levels were not good,not in my case... these alarms set off good piercing loudlevels. Achieves good expectations for a cheap alarm.Things that should be known about this...Alarms does exactly whats stated...But this is an alternative way of not spending a monthly feeof 99$ or more.With a professional alarm, it is hooked up to, Police station,Fire dept. & Alarm service center for when it goes off,it can be turned off, & you will be notified.With this door alarm if someone breaks in... alarm goes off & this piercingsound continues until you cut it off... so if you are somewherefar away out of town... ( what happens? ).So you have to judge when or how you use this.Otherwise its still a good way of keeping someone running fromyour home. Robbers would not no whether or not its connected topolice station. I'm going to keep my main security system & usethis for protecting in another area.I do recommend this alarm when using in a knowlegeable way.

Reviews.Title: Garage Door Protection from Amazon
Reviews.Author: WA8UOC
Reviews.Content: Like many homes, mine has a side door to the garage. This is probably the easiest entry point to my home if someone wanted to get in. There is a window in this door so it would be easy to break the glass and unlock the door. I wanted something to alert me if the door was opened and this does the job nicely. It is small and compact and loud. It is easy to program with the keypad on the front. It comes with a mounting plate and screws or you can use the double stick tape which is included.The word "Wireless" may lead you to think it will transmit a signal to a remote receiver but that is not the case.If you go in the garage and open the door in the dark be ready to scramble for a light because you will not be able to see the key pad to shut this thing off! IT IS LOUD!

Reviews.Title: alarm for the doors
Reviews.Author: Janet
Reviews.Content: This is very loud and useful, however the buttoms are a little hard to push. I would recommend this for families with small children and as a sub for a professional alarm

Reviews.Title: Money well spent
Reviews.Author: Vincent
Reviews.Content: I decided having a loaded gun is useless if I can't hear an intruder enter my home, so I bought this for extra security at night.It's very simple, affordable, and effective. I believe an intruder would probably abort mission once they activate the alarm but if they don't at least I'll be ready for them.I have an older home. My door when shut is not completely flush with the doorway where the magnet attaches (The alarm sits about 1/4" in front of the magnet). This hasn't posed a problem and I've had no false alarms. The instructions indicate there's 1/2" to play around with and it's lived up to that. Setup was a breeze however the 3 aaa batteries you'll need are not included.I have 2 minor complaints.Unless you enter your code there's no way to tell if the alarm's active just by looking at it. It would be nice if the alarm had a light to indicate when the alarm is active. There's the potential to create confusion among family members and set off the alarm by accident.Another small complaint is the sound the keypad makes when entering the code. It's pretty loud. I've woken up my 2 year old twice now just by punching in my code from downstairs.So, in conclusion it's not perfect but it gets the job done and it's 11 bucks. Money well spent in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: Love It! It actually works as it's claimed to!
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Savino
Reviews.Content: Love this! It's a great price, and is so easy to install and use. The large keypad makes it much easier to hit w/accuracy than other alarms I've used in the past. The delay upon entering/exiting is perfect. Will be ordering a backup shortly! The only discrepancy I noticed in the instructions is that when you enter the code to arm the unit, it will flash green a few times, then will flash red during the countdown to being armed...this is normal, it is working properly - not sure why they didn't mention it!

Reviews.Title: ear piercing!
Reviews.Author: Remel Smith
Reviews.Content: We've had this for about 2 years and it's still working perfectly. It is very loud, so in my opinion it does what its supposed to!

Reviews.Title: Wireless Door Alarm: GE 45117 De Luxe
Reviews.Author: Victoria
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews before selecting this alarm. Excellent! Exactly what I needed for the apartment of a senior relative.fo entrance-door  safety purposes.

Reviews.Title: very loud!!
Reviews.Author: kate
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter to use in her apartment which is in a sketchy neighborhood.  We both sleep better knowing there is NO way she could sleep through someone opening her door!!Easy to set up and she can remove it (double sided tape) when she moves

Reviews.Title: wouldn't recommend
Reviews.Author: Timothy Holden
Reviews.Content: Not what I was expecting the sensor is not loud enough for me to hear up stairs in my house

Reviews.Title: Item was easy to install and easy to operate.
Reviews.Author: Raymond J. McMahon
Reviews.Content: Installed with no tools and works exactly as advertized. Easy to program. Can't beat the price. I would recommend this product for protecting your doors from intruders.

Reviews.Title: reliable and cost-effective.  happy customer here.
Reviews.Author: aa
Reviews.Content: easy to install. reliable and cost-effective.  my 2nd purchase.  installed the first, 3 months ago, it's still good and reliable.

Reviews.Title: This door alarm is absolutely fantastic. The chime function is really neat
Reviews.Author: roy l. parker
Reviews.Content: This door alarm is absolutely fantastic. The chime function is really neat. It chimes whenever the door is opened.. with a loud but pleasant tone. The decibel level on the alarm function is great. even if an intruder were to tear the alarm off of the wall; without the proper code, it would still continue to sound the alarm until the batteries ran out. I love it !

Reviews.Title: Great Door Alert
Reviews.Author: Tracy Byers
Reviews.Content: Serves the purpose well. Bought this to alert me of the storm door opening. I have 2 kids under the age of 2 and the youngest one is very sneeky. She made it outside without making a noise which is what prompted the purchase. Works as described and I installed both pieces with some velcro tape as noted in other reviews.  We like to welcome visitors after the chime with a "welcome to walgreens" and a laugh because the chime is so loud and annoying.

Reviews.Title: Pool alarm!
Reviews.Author: Maureen
Reviews.Content: I purchased this alarm for the door leading out to the pool. It works great and is easy to install. One pool accident is too many...

Reviews.Title: Dang Near Perfect For My Purposes
Reviews.Author: David Kavich
Reviews.Content: It works great, louder than all get-out. Th eonly reason I marked it down a notch is that I wish it had an indicator for when it has been armed. One winds up not being sure sometimes, and having to punch in the code just to see that it was not armed, and then again to arm it.

Reviews.Title: Great product.
Reviews.Author: Eric D. Washburn "EDw"
Reviews.Content: You may want to screw it to the door.  The sticky pad may loose its strength and fall off door and your alarm could be going off during your whole vacation.  I like it!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: C. T. Kofford
Reviews.Content: Alarm was really easy to install, and it was also real easy to setup. It has a door chime mode as well as an alarm mode which is pretty loud and easy to disable.

Reviews.Title: Hasn't held up
Reviews.Author: Jessica and Duane Darby
Reviews.Content: Hasn't held up. Zaps battery's quickly. Is very loud but goes off by itself frequently. Wouldn't buy again. Not durable

Reviews.Title: A need
Reviews.Author: KL
Reviews.Content: So, I already have a whole house alarm system but wanted something for my bedroom door. This was perfect for that door.

Reviews.Title: Good product, LOUD
Reviews.Author: Grace Wasmer
Reviews.Content: We installed these on our front and back doors. Very loud when they go off!!My only gripe is if they are not secured to the door, they can just be taken off and covered with your hands to make the noise stop.But overall not a bad product at all, especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: Gets the job done, although some annoying quirks
Reviews.Author: Rick G. "Rick Gualtieri"
Reviews.Content: For the price, it's a capable alarm.  It installed fairly quickly, although the cheap screws that come with it will strip if you look at them too harshly.My biggest issue is with Alarm mode.  There doesn't appear to be a way to open the door without setting it off.  Typing in the code doesn't disarm it.  Not great when you're trying to take the dogs out at 6:00 Am and not wake everyone up.  Kind of a stupid programming flaw.I've wound up leaving it on "Away" mode, which isn't ideal as there's a 30 second delay before the alarm goes off.

Reviews.Title: Works great on side garage door
Reviews.Author: Evian260
Reviews.Content: We had a string of break-ins through garage side doors in our sub and we bought this to protect our garage.  Does the trick - the alarm is scarily loud!

Reviews.Title: good for the money
Reviews.Author: musiclistener1114
Reviews.Content: ...with a rash of recent break ins i felt that I should at a bare minimum have something, anything that would act as a theft deterrent so I got this for the door that leads out to my fenced in backyard.  It's loud enough to startle someone who's breaking in and potentially scare them off which is good....installation is really easy and the setup is easy as well.  No tools required.  You can enable it/disable it at will...set it to alarm immediately when the door is opened or with a 45 second delay.  The only bad thing about this is that if a thief was not immediately scared off by the alarm, it would take about 10 seconds to yank it off the wall and smash it to pieces.  Not GE's fault...if you want a full fledged security system go pay for it.  This is a great product for a theft deterrent system.

Reviews.Title: Extremely LOUD!
Reviews.Author: KaDe
Reviews.Content: I even put a piece of duc tape over the area where sound comes out b/c it's too loud and I didn't wait it to hurt my cats ears.

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: Oaklander
Reviews.Content: the wireless alarm is very loud and easy to set up. obviously not as good as an alarm that will contact police or a service. but it's a good deterrent. i do wonder what would happen if a burglar stomped on the thing though.

Reviews.Title: I like these door alarms
Reviews.Author: Carol Miller
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 of these alarms and installed them today. I found them easy to install with the double-sided tape. One door had a bit of a curved door frame , but the magnetic alarm still worked. The alarm is piercing! VERY LOUD. i installed them to keep a handicapped granddaughter from leaving the house without my knowledge, but the loud alarm would definitely wake a person and alert them to an intruder. I ordered another one today to install on the sliding patio door. Definitely a good buy.

Reviews.Title: this is great I think I may get another one
Reviews.Author: stacy
Reviews.Content: I have this alarm and I screwed it into my sons door who is also autistic and it works great and is loud I have no complaints with it I didn't use the tape it came with I used screws but uaed screws that was better durable and it works awesone to the point he won't open his door if I forget to shut it off when I shut it off I leave it on home and push it up to alarm from being on chime

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: Alarm works as promised and is horribly loud.  This would scare off any intruder and probably make them deaf in the process.  It is very simple but works.  I would not buy to use the chime mode though, it is loud and sounds awful.

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy
Reviews.Author: Geetha K
Reviews.Content: We were out of town and wanted to buy something secure so that it would alert neighbours in our absence. We have tried it while being locked inside of our apartment and it creates a really loud noise. It fits in my budget and helped us protect our belongings while we were away on vacation.

Reviews.Title: It's good
Reviews.Author: Dino
Reviews.Content: It's loud, but not like condominium scale loud, it's loud enough you will hear it in your room. Easy to install, batteries are lasting a few months now. One thing that doesn't have, it's something to tell you that it's activated, and you could easily forget and turn it on or off by mistake, the only way to differentiate it is by the number of chirps it does when you activate it.It works good for their purpose

Reviews.Title: Easy setup; EXTREMELY LOUD - ear piercing
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: My father purchased this for me after I became concerned someone was entering my apartment at night without me knowing.  It is very easy to set up.  I strongly recommend using the chime option though unless you have a large house and wouldn't hear the chime clearly in a bedroom far away from the door.  The alarm is absolutely EAR PIERCING.  I accidentally set it off once after I armed the alarm, then decided I hadn't positioned it correctly and moved the magnet.  Once I moved the magnet, the alarm was absolutely deafening.  Anyway, it should definitely scare off any would-be intruders.  I feel much safer with this product on my door.

Reviews.Title: Does just what I expected.
Reviews.Author: Julian Garcia
Reviews.Content: I bought this door alarm to be alerted to my front door opening. All I needed was an alarm loud enough to alert my dogs who would in turn alert me. The alarm is very loud, standing next to it hurts my ears. The keypad is a little small, even for my wife who has very small hands. It would be nice if the numbers on the keypad lit up, but for the price this is a great product.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: Maddawg39
Reviews.Content: Excellent!!  Easy to install on door and door frame. A good amount of "non activation" space available between magnet and alarm body to mount on any door and door frame.  Extremely loud, no brainer to set up.  For the money can't beat what this unit offers.Unit will be used for fromt door.  Great for the money!!

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: J. Leary "Indiana Grandma"
Reviews.Content: This is a good alarm, easy to install, easy to use.  It was very useful for our purpose, as we had a child who tried to "escape" at the drop of a hat.  We bought one for home and the daycare.

Reviews.Title: Sleeping better at night...
Reviews.Author: Cassidy
Reviews.Content: This is as good as it gets for the price.  It is super loud, works as described, and helps me to sleep better knowing that I would hear an intruder.  I keep it on chime during the day and alarm while I'm sleeping.  I haven't had any of the problems reported in the negative reviews.  Short of having a monitored alarm, this is the next best thing.  My only complaint was that it's difficult to hang with the amount of adhesive provided, and I didn't want to drill holes in my door.  The large portion fell off when the door was pulled shut.  I bought industrial strength velcro tape and put several strips on the large piece of the alarm.  Problem solved.  It now hangs sturdily.

Reviews.Title: Very Loud
Reviews.Author: Zachary "Zachary"
Reviews.Content: This thing is very loud. Love the modes you can set it to. I wish it had more than four keys though.

Reviews.Title: This thing is LOUD
Reviews.Author: Ruben Garza
Reviews.Content: I have it on chime mode so I can hear when the door opens even when I am upstairs.  It works really well, but when I am the one opening the door it really blasts my ear drums. I had some trouble installing it, and found it worked best for me when putting the unit on the door and the smaller part on the door jam.  Overall I'm happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Should have expected less..
Reviews.Author: breed3134
Reviews.Content: So I bought this thing less than five months ago, and I was glad to get an alarm for so little money. About a week and a half ago, the light on the alarm started flashing, indicating that the batteries needed to be changed. "That's a little early," I thought, since the manual indicated that the batteries would last a year. When I went to change them, I noticed some corrosion in the battery area. I don't know if it was a flaw in the device, or the batteries (which were duracell, so they weren't cheap batteries) but even with fresh batteries, the device is dead. $12 for less than five months of service? I'll be buying a new alarm soon, but it won't be this one.

Reviews.Title: Good product, reasonable price
Reviews.Author: Ian
Reviews.Content: Overall, this item has satisfied me.  I would recommend it to a friend.  The only con, which I attribute justifiably to the price, are that there is no intermittent beeping of the alarm when you open the door during an "away" setting.  That is, when you come home, and the alarm is armed on away, usually you unlock the door and open it, and you hear a slow, metronomic beeping to help you remember that the alarm is armed.  Then after a period of time, if not disarmed, the real alarm would go off.  This alarm does not have that feature.  But that is a minor thing, and for the price, I don't think it's a big deal.  That's the only reason why this isn't five stars.  Everything else is great.It's actually pretty loud... enough to give someone a start, wake you up, and deter anyone from venturing futher.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Alton Jones
Reviews.Content: Iam so very please with my alarm.I feel so more secure with it.It is a very vauable product.(safety)This is a great product

Reviews.Title: It works,  It is easy to setup, and seems to be well made.
Reviews.Author: okiedan "Pro Bono Publico"
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these for my daughters new apartment.  The advantage to this item is that when she returns home it will beep a countdown for 40 seconds.  It it does not beep down to the alarm sounding she knows her home has been entered.  It also has a door chime feature.  this was very easy to install.  Do not know if the two sided tape is strong enough to hold up the main unit so I used the provided screws and put the main unit on the door jam and the magnet on the metal door.  Did not want to make holes in the metal door....did not think the owners would like that.It is very loud when the alarm goes off.  The chime is also loud but not to the point of being too much.Highly recommend this item if you are looking for a way to insure your love one is safe when returning home from work or sleeping at night.

Reviews.Title: A must have product!
Reviews.Author: sweetmom
Reviews.Content: Our old house had an alarm system and we kind of gotten use to it and feel more safer knowing that you get alarm whenever someone coming in or if you forgot to close the door especially in the evening time. we moved to another house and there's no alarm system on either one of the door, since then i been trying to find portable alarm to put in the door and when i found this one i've been eager to try this product, it really works well and the alarm is really loud, now i know if my kid open the door even if i'm busy doing someting..Perfect product and good quality, i'm planning to buy again for the other door...

Reviews.Title: It Works Well
Reviews.Author: JeJe
Reviews.Content: Works like a charm. Th charm is loud and good for home use and the alarm is so loud it should scare anyone trying to come in and should easily be heard by surrounding neighbors. For the price it works great!

Reviews.Title: Loud
Reviews.Author: M
Reviews.Content: For the price, it does the job. It's nice and loud and functions as specified. I wish there were more numbers to choose from on the keypad when setting the code (to make it more difficult to guess), but other than that I don't have too many complaints about it.

Reviews.Title: Nice, cheap solution
Reviews.Author: Paul J Vogel
Reviews.Content: I bought this after a break-in to protect a home office and am very pleased with the results.  It's louder than heck & reliable, just what I wanted to scare away any local kid that might want to grab a couple of my computers.  Basically the local kids are just ignorant amateurs looking to pawn equipment for a few bucks and loud noise is enough to startle them and get them to run.  Admittedly, it doesn't call any numbers, but that doesn't seem important to me since I don't think they'd hang around in the house more than a couple of minutes in any case - the previous break-in was just a grab and run.  In this case police can't respond quickly enough, so the best bet is to scare off the intruder quickly, and this unit is dandy for that.It also scares the heck out of my wife when she forgets about it.  Keeps her young.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Inexpensive Solution
Reviews.Author: Ells Lloyd
Reviews.Content: Installed it in my girlfriend's apartment for her peace of mind.  Installation was easy with basic skill.  Chime function is nice, but alarm is just what the doctor ordered.  Very loud, and settable to either in-home (no alarm delay) or out-of-home (with alarm delay to allow disarming).  Does not use a remote (a good thing if your keys are already a bit unwieldy).  Adequate construction.  Works with either metal or wood doors/door-frames.  Detachable, and very affordable.

Reviews.Title: GE wireless door alarm
Reviews.Author: Fromsure
Reviews.Content: I had ordered a wireless doorbell for some elderly friends from GE that had a flashing light along with a chime. It worked so well that I decided to try this wireless door/entry alarm. It works great also! Easy to install and operate. It is amazing how loud this little alarm is. It will definitely get your attention.

Reviews.Title: Indoor Alarm
Reviews.Author: Discover
Reviews.Content: So far I am  happy with the performance. The only problem I've had is when I punch in the code numbers too fast I get a red flash and have to redo code.

Reviews.Title: Door Alarm
Reviews.Author: Dorothy Callicotte "enjoys sewing"
Reviews.Content: It makes a nice chiming noise when opened, was easy to install and the alarm would let  you know if someone was leaving or coming in, very loud.

Reviews.Title: door alarm
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: Product is as advertised. My only complaint is that the slide switch which activates either the ear-splitting alarm or the chime (which was what I wanted) is very small and fragile and easily mis-set, so someone with poor vision and/or difficulty with small hand adjustments might easily end up with an unwanted very loud alarm. However, the product is a good value for its price.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: EAddison192
Reviews.Content: Very loud alarm, it works great for my new apartment. I live with three other girls and they all love it, and know how to set it and shut it off. The only thing I would suggest is in the description adding *Needs 3 AAA batteries. Other than that it shipped very quickly and I recieved it a day early. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: does this alarm keep on sounding
Reviews.Author: R. Hawotte
Reviews.Content: This alarm was easy to install, easy to set up and looks good on the door.  I have one big concern.  If we are away for 2 weeks, set the alarm on the alarm setting and someone tries to get into our home the first day after we left, does the alarm keep sounding until we get home 2 weeks later or until the battery dies?  This is a big concern and I dont' see the answer on the paperwork with the alarm.  Until I have an answer, I'll use it just for when we are home.  We have cats and their hearing would be damaged for sure if this loud alarm rang for anymore than 5 minutes plus I doubt if the neighbors would be happy with us either.  Five minutes would either scare away a burgler or give him time to break the unit and continue to burglerize our home.

Reviews.Title: easy to install and use
Reviews.Author: rmisasa
Reviews.Content: I like this stand-alone alarm. It's easy to install and setup. It allows you to set a 4-digit code although the code may not be one of the super password. The alarm sound is loud so hopefully it can scare bad guys off the door.

Reviews.Title: Door alarm that doesn't work.
Reviews.Author: Dale C
Reviews.Content: I had high hopes for this door alarm based on comments made by previous purchasers.  Despite mounting the device according to directions (and moving it several times), it would not work.  When the door was opened, nothing happened.  The only time I could get the alarm to sound is when I held the two sections, one in each hand, and waved them around in different directions until it would finally chime.  To me, this product is totally worthless.  That's why I returned it for a refund.

Reviews.Title: Problematic
Reviews.Author: Dean Ouellette
Reviews.Content: Yeah, the siren is loud, but there are two major problems with the product. 1. The activation delay of 30 seconds is long enough for an intruder to gain deep access to your house. 2. An intruder can easily locate the alarm on the back of the door, then smash it to bits before the siren activates.

Reviews.Title: Small but Useful
Reviews.Author: So Cal Linda
Reviews.Content: This is my second door alarm so I'm comparing the two. The good, priced well, Alarm is very loud, I like the way this one has a chime also although I don't use it because its kind of loud. Very easy to install alarm. Requires no holes if you just want to use the double sided tape like I did. On the bad side, the keypad is pretty small to punch in numbers and there is no flashing light to let you know it's on so I've had to keep a note as to how many beeps mean its on and off. 2 beeps means its on). Course the last sentence is due to age. All in all its going to wake you if an intruder tried to enter.

Reviews.Title: does not perform consistently
Reviews.Author: jadegal
Reviews.Content: tested this out yesterday and noticed a few things I didn't like...1. alarm is EAR-PIERCINGLY LOUD - so loud that my ear was ringing for so long after it went off (I only let it go off for about 5 secs, long enough to enter the code to stop it)...was afraid I may have damaged my kid's ear drum2. the chime alarm is so annoying...it's got this high pitch tone to it, not a soft doorbell chime...that bothered me as well. I wouldn't want to hear that every time someone opens the door3. the chime goes off randomly, as long as the magnet piece comes close to the main piece, it sets the chime off, even if you didn't open the door. This was odd, and could definitely lead to false alarms at night...scary.4. the fact that there's only 4 numbers to play with is not good...ppl can easily guess your passcode after a few tries5. the learn button is hidden beneath the battery compartment (you have to open it with a screw driver to see it), and the manual didn't mention that; it just said to push the learn button, but didn't say where it's located...took me forever to find it; finally found it after watching a youtube video - how inconsiderate of the manual writer...

Reviews.Title: I'm sure they'd work fine, but not if you have molding around your doors
Reviews.Author: Mom2Twins
Reviews.Content: There is no way to line up the alarm box and the magnet if you have molding around your doors, unless you are willing to cut into the molding, which I am not.  Had to return them.

Reviews.Title: Great Addition to your Home Security
Reviews.Author: Evalistic
Reviews.Content: This is a very good product - Easy to set up and install. Performs better than more expensive door alarms that I've tried in the past. Makes a great combo with the window security stickers I also purchased at the same time.GE 45117 Deluxe Wireless Door AlarmDefender SP100-ST 4 Pack of Window Warning Stickers with UV Fade Protection (Black)

Reviews.Title: very loud chime
Reviews.Author: 5mom
Reviews.Content: We've had our door alarm by GE for a few weeks now. We got it so that I would know when the door was opened. I had an ear infection that caused me to have hearing loss that maybe be permanent. With 5 children it is hard to be everywhere at one time and I was concerned that a child would open the door and I wouldn't know it. I have never used the alarm function, just the chime. And chime it does! It makes an extremely loud *ding dong* when the door is opened. So loud that it almost hurts your ears. It comes with two mounting options, tape and screws. We used the tape and it's holding so far. The installation was very fast, maybe one minute from 'in the package' to 'in use'. It takes regular batteries. It has given me peace of mind and that is priceless. The only down side is that I can't figure out how to turn it off. We recently had a party and the loud chiming got extremely annoying as people went in and out.

Reviews.Title: Peace of mind
Reviews.Author: Tara
Reviews.Content: We have been struggling with destructive behaviors in our son like stealing things from around the house, lying, and sneaking around and getting into things at night so our doctor recommended trying to figure out some way of monitoring him if he is getting up for the safety of the rest of the family and we ran across this alarm. Since we have been using it, he no longer gets up at night because if he opens the door we will hear the alarm. Now if he has to go to the bathroom or has an issue he knocks on the door and we can get up and let him out without the loud alarm going off.We no longer have to worry he is getting into chemicals or tools or other dangerous things like he used to, and the stealing at night has been remedied as well and I think we all sleep better.

Reviews.Title: Does the job!
Reviews.Author: Case
Reviews.Content: Works well. Very loud. People rated it as having a delay. It's a very tiny delay that doesn't effect anything.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Joe De
Reviews.Content: Once you get the hang of it will be a nice addition to your home security system.Read the directions.  It can be confusing when first setting up.  A cognizant intruder may be able to destroy it in the delay time (which is engineered into the system so it can be turned off before the alarm sounds, buy entering the code,  upon legitimate entry)before any alarm sounds.  Be sure you have a plan for what you will do in the middle of the night when the alarm sounds.  The alarm will indicate something is happening,  the rest is up to you.  It is a cheap localized device, and it works as intended.

Reviews.Title: These work as-advertised, but mount close to magnet
Reviews.Author: TRJ
Reviews.Content: These work as other say, just mount them close to the magnet so it makes a clean and long break from the sensor. Have only had a few weeks, but so far, they're rock solid (as I'd hope, for an alarm, right?)

Reviews.Title: Didn't last
Reviews.Author: Marie&Gary Baldwin
Reviews.Content: When we first got it set up was easy and it worked great for several months.  It stopped working correctly 4 or 5 months after we bought it.  The alarm would go off after we entered the correct password and it will not let us reset it.

Reviews.Title: Malfunctions. At times the alarm will sound when disarmed.
Reviews.Author: N. Shaw
Reviews.Content: I purchased this about a month ago. I was pleased at first, but after a month it has malfunctioned twice, setting off the alarm. That can get me into trouble with my neighbors or law enforcement. I'm not pleased.The first time this thing went off on me I thought it punched in the wrong code. The second time (at 11 PM) I keyed the code correctly, got two blinking green lights (indicating that it was disarmed). I opened the door and the alarm went off anyway. I had to rip it off the door and cover it in pillows until the battery went out. I'll repeat this. The two green lights flashed, indicating that it was successfully disarmed and the alarm STILL WENT OFF.I COULD NOT SHUT IF OFF.There needs to be something that says "armed" or "disarmed" on the actual unit.

Reviews.Title: Sound is different
Reviews.Author: Poocher
Reviews.Content: Usually when you purchase two of something, you expect them to be the same. I have two of these purchased about one year apart. I really like them both. However, the tone of the second one is much higher pitch. I like the tone of the first one better.

Reviews.Title: Great low cost product
Reviews.Author: Seth Saylor
Reviews.Content: this is a great alarm, and a lot less expensive than a whole house security system, but you do get what you pay for.It met all of my expectations, and is easy to use

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Miguel
Reviews.Content: Not what I thought it would be. I would have returned it, but not work the trouble to go out of my way.

Reviews.Title: awesome device!
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Awesome alarm works well in the barracks and is very loud and easy to install. Will prder more later on.

Reviews.Title: This will sound every single time you open the door
Reviews.Author: L. Short
Reviews.Content: While this is a great idea, there is no off button. Every time you open the door, the chime sounds at a minimum. In addition, you can't just leave your door open. There is no off button. That was not indicated in the materials.

Reviews.Title: depends on your need.
Reviews.Author: R. Custer
Reviews.Content: I had guys breaking into my locker at work to haze me and I wanted to surprise them. This device works well and is a piece of cake to set up. Looks nice. My one problem with it is the sound level. Lots here have said it's loud, well maybe in a hotel room or to let you know someone came through your door. I doubt any neighbors will hear and it really didn't scare the guys breaking in. They walked by shaking the locker just to set it off. It ran for hours when no paid it any attention. I understand my factory noise is pretty loud, but I had to be 20' away to even know it was on.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Patrice P Conley
Reviews.Content: I bought this alarm to provide a little protection for my teenage son who is at home alone most nights due to my husband and my work schedule. It is very loud and would scare anyone away. Although I do hate it when my son and I go out to the store and when we return and open the door my husband has the alarm set and it starts squealing in our ears! This is a very good investment for now while we are living here in apartments.

Reviews.Title: Works as described.
Reviews.Author: Maddog
Reviews.Content: I would not use this as a stand alone alarm system, but as a supplement it works well.  Installation is easy...insert batteries, program code, attach tape, and then attach alarm.  When you install the device you have to make sure the sensor is touching the side of the alarm.  ANY gap and the alarm or door chime will not function.  Once aligned properly it works great.  I only gave it four stars simply because of how close the sensor and alarm have to be in order for the device to work.  Otherwise, its reliable, loud, and works great.

Reviews.Title: Works but that so called chime, Ouch
Reviews.Author: Darleen Salada
Reviews.Content: It is programable and works but the sound of the so-called chime scares me every time I open the door. People that is not a chime, that's an alarm. I guess I got what I paid for but would definitely have ordered something else had I been familiar with this product. I am not real happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Very loud
Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: They're simple to operate, very loud & easy to install.  I also like that they take AAA batteries and not button cell/watch batteries.  I didn't give it 5 stars because I wish the keypad attached to the door a little more securely.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: DANIEL PETRO
Reviews.Content: Really cool. Exactly what we were looking for. Super easy installation.  The alarm is very loud and works very well

Reviews.Title: GOOD ONE
Reviews.Author: sparky
Reviews.Content: I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS FOR ANY ONE SEEKING TO MMAKE THEIR HOME OR BUSINESS SAFER. I WILL BE BUYING MORE OF THIS ITEM IN THE FUTURE.

Reviews.Title: Oh lordy, loud as dickens!
Reviews.Author: Robert Ward
Reviews.Content: My university has this alarm system for their upstairs library doors which are not to be used at anytime. I tried to deactivate the alarm in order to sneak out a book the librarian had on hold for one of my classes. Things got crazy when that "loud as dickens" alarm went off. Let's just say, I won't be trying to sneak out study material anytime soon!#MyWJU

Reviews.Title: Okay......
Reviews.Author: Tina
Reviews.Content: Not as loud as I'd like , can easily be removed by an intruder. but its definitely worth the price that I paid for it.

Reviews.Title: This alarm says "Attention I am an intruder see me run!"
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: If you don't like the chime always sounding take it off the hook thingy it attaches to the door with (the piece which allows you to take it down to change the batteries or code.) Also,  If you have ever assembled anything before you ought to know to never take a permanent step such as putting it on the super sticky tape, without making sure everything lines up first! My tip: scotch tape and a pencil... use the tape to hold it in desired spot, open door, hear chime, mark with pencil, attach permanently, enjoy knowing intruders will fall all over themselves trying to escape the decibel level of the actual alarm and everyone in a very large radius will witness their retreat!

Reviews.Title: Last for a very long time
Reviews.Author: PS3FanGirl "dabpro"
Reviews.Content: I bought this a long time ago and it is still doing well! Battery install and all and it has been going on for at least 2 years now. Very happy with this purchase!! �

Reviews.Title: Stopped working right after a couple of weeks
Reviews.Author: Misunderstood Computer God "exodus203.com"
Reviews.Content: It worked really well at first, but then about two weeks later it would unarm itself or it wouldn't take the code the first time -- failing after the I entered the second number in the secret code (it's a four digit code).

Reviews.Title: Janky.
Reviews.Author: Klinton Pipes
Reviews.Content: This product is not what I was looking for. Even mounted correctly, it often fails to go off. It also has a very cheap look and feel to it. Swann makes a much better product.

Reviews.Title: I'm impressed...
Reviews.Author: Graciele "Graciele"
Reviews.Content: It's very simple to use and have it stored your personal number. Loud enough to bother any burglar. I bought my 1st one 3 years ago and buying another one again. Go for it!

Reviews.Title: very simple to operate
Reviews.Author: amazon shopper
Reviews.Content: Very simple to operate and so loud it hurts my ears instantly, even if you just use the door chime mode its so loud the cat hates it. Even though someone could garb it and stomp on it i think the noise is so intense they will run from it.

Reviews.Title: its okay
Reviews.Author: Gloria Gallegos
Reviews.Content: I waited a long time for this product. though I am still getting emails stating that I have to return it after managers sent me a new one because the first one they sent was damaged while on the way to me. that is the only frustrating part. it works fine.

Reviews.Title: Never could get the Alarm to work
Reviews.Author: Katelyn
Reviews.Content: Delivery was okay. When the item arrived, i immediately started setting it up. It was easy for me to get the Chime to work, but I could not get the Alarm to work. At first I tried without the instructions, then after spending much time trying to figure it out i started reading threw all of the instructions & even got some help from a friend. We turned the instruction booklet upside down & still could not get the alarm to work.

Reviews.Title: Life saver
Reviews.Author: Emily
Reviews.Content: We love this machine. We had an almost break in a couple of months ago. Luckily my husband was awake and thief ran off, but the damage was done and my husband developed such high anxiety he could not sleep. So we placed these on and wuala. He is sleeping again. Alarm works perfect and is very loud to we're neighbors can hear it as we'll  we are very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Loud. Easy to install.  Reasonable price.  serves it's purpose.
Reviews.Author: fezzik
Reviews.Content: The alarm itself is extremely loud.  We use it in doorbell/chime mode.  That is also very loud, but a very loud ding-dong.  Enough to alert us that the door has been opened.We use it for in - home safety.Very easy install.  Don't use the code ever to disable.  Since it mounted to high for a child to mess with, having an on/off button would be nice.For the price it would be hard to beat

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Candice
Reviews.Content: Bought this after our house was robbed, it is very easy to operate & is quite loud! If the wrong pass code is typed in it gets louder! Very easy to install! Only thing is you sometimes have to give it a minute to lock it if you just used the pass code to unlock it. It is Worth peace of mind!

Reviews.Title: Good Alarm
Reviews.Author: K B in Woodinville, WA
Reviews.Content: Chime is a bit louder then expected, works well but no volume option.  Great alert if a door is being open.

Reviews.Title: Line it up properly, and this device is a great alarm/deterrent.
Reviews.Author: N.W.
Reviews.Content: The trick to this alarm is that the arrow on the magnet/sensor needs to be lined up with the arrow on the keypad. If the arrows are not lined up, the keypad does not always sense the door opening or closing properly. I lined up the arrows and use this on my office door. The alarm is very loud. I just enter my pin, leave my office, and I know it has a significant deterrent for thieves. I open the office door and there is a single beep/chime to remind me the alarm is on. I just enter my code, and the alarm is off. Easy to install and use.

Reviews.Title: Cheap product
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Tinkerbell411"
Reviews.Content: We put in our code and item does not always work properly. It my go off even when used properly. It goes thru batteries far to quickly. Not very happy with the system at all.

Reviews.Title: Good, cheap alarm
Reviews.Author: James C. Brogan
Reviews.Content: Wow is this thing loud!!!  Would definitely scare someone away.  Would not be able to handle the sound.  Good product.

Reviews.Title: Loud lil device
