Reviews.Author: Michael A. McClaskey
Reviews.Content: This lil thing is LOUD and works like it should and yes I would recommend it to anyone for the price

Reviews.Title: Great Security For A Great Price
Reviews.Author: Fleahead
Reviews.Content: Mine operates just as described. This is not going to prevent a breakin, but certain that no one will stick around long after the tone goes off. Most burglaries come from low intelligence, low-lifes that wouldn't be able to figure this thing out. Just run away.

Reviews.Title: Easy Install...Very Loud
Reviews.Author: Mike Jennings
Reviews.Content: I bought this alarm to install on a basement door.  It took some time to figure out how it works as I had never installed one before.  But, after installation,  I really like the alarm.  The alarm sound is extremely loud and easy to use.  I have found myself on several occasions forgetting to disarm the alarm when I open the door and it has scared the crap out of me when I open the door and set it off.

Reviews.Title: Recommended alarm
Reviews.Author: T. Hollins
Reviews.Content: Ok we've been using these for over a year.They're flawless.Let's say we use these instead of locking our storage doors. It keeps a particular child from going through the door for snacks. If they do, our neighbors will hear it too.It has stopped our child from grabbing snacks too much.If you use this for a real alarm, you will be pleased with it. It absolutely works, and cannot be ignored.

Reviews.Title: Good stuff!
Reviews.Author: Christian NOTW
Reviews.Content: Works great!! only problem is that the chime is a little too loud but other than that, it is a great way to deter unwanted guest!

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: J. Morehouse "Jaxx3"
Reviews.Content: It was easy to install, took only about 10 minutes per alarm, maybe even less once I got the hang of it.  They can be set in a gentle chime mode that goes off when the door is opened, silent, or alarm.  Be warned, it is a loud alarm.  I have forgotten to unarm it a few times before letting my dogs out in the morning, and punching the code in while it goes off is unpleasant.  But for me, I wanted an alarm that is loud...like an alarm.  So I am very pleased with how easy it was to install, how easy it is to work with everyday, and that it makes us feel secure at night knowing no one can open the doors without those alarms going off.  Money well spent.

Reviews.Title: Small and Loud
Reviews.Author: B. Lowery "tree trimmer"
Reviews.Content: This alarm is very loud and easy to install...follow directions very carefully because it must be correct or it will not work.

Reviews.Title: The best alternative for an inexpensive door alarm...
Reviews.Author: john g.
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and it works very well. Nice and loud or a quieter mode if that's what your after. A good buy, value.

Reviews.Title: Great alarm system for rentals
Reviews.Author: April *Another Geek Girl*
Reviews.Content: So I purchased two of these for my apartment in the rough side of town- one for the main door and one for the sliding patio door just in case. The chime sounds kind of like a chime for a department store dressing room- not too loud but loud enough. The alarm is LOUD and if you happen to forget the code, it takes awhile to get the darn cover off! You can definitely deafen the sound by using your hand, but just a few seconds of the alarm blaring was enough for my neighbors to call security and make sure I was okay.My only complaint is this thing needs to have a darn OFF switch. Seriously, the only options are the alarm or the chime, and sometimes if the door is going to be opened/closed a lot it would be nice to have an off switch, other than open the thing up and take out the batteries. Other than that its great, lets hope it keeps the thieves away!

Reviews.Title: I have mixed emotions about this
Reviews.Author: Shaun Gaynor
Reviews.Content: I purchase two of these. For the price they are fine. They do what they claim to do. However if the alarm goes off all you have to do is cover it with your hand and the sound is quiet. Or take one smack at it and break it. That being said it will likely startle someone and they'll leave. I wouldn't suggest protecting valuables with this but rather just to deter people from entering a yard or something.

Reviews.Title: door alarm
Reviews.Author: Frankie
Reviews.Content: excellent product ..the door chime and the alarm are very loud and thats what we were looking for. I do highly recommend this product

Reviews.Title: Easy to install and setup...value for money
Reviews.Author: PhatPhish
Reviews.Content: Pretty easy to installWorks each time..the sound is pretty loud to wake up the neighbors.If you are buying this as a burglar alarm then this is not it...this is just a simple door alarm for your apartment/condo that gives you peace of mind at night from breakins...it will wake up the neighbors for sure.Minus one star since the manual said the magnet should be 1/2 an inch away ...it's more like 1/4 inch only.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: The units work vary well not as secure as I would like but have a good alarm and work when door moves.

Reviews.Title: one more security blanket
Reviews.Author: ray
Reviews.Content: we are grandparents when the cuties ones come over, we simply place the unit on the door, in the chime mode makes us feel more secure with a pool just outside. Easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Amazing alarm!
Reviews.Author: Eric Ray Garon
Reviews.Content: If you live in an apartment, or house for that much, and want extra piece of mind... look no further. I ordered this for my apartment and read all of the reviews beforehand. Many repeat the theme of "OMG IT'S SOOOO LOUD." and man they were not kidding. During the instructions I entered the code and caught myself thinking "hmm, those beeps were not that bad, what is all the hype about?" Let me forewarn you, these are not the same volume as the alarm. I decided to "test it" with the unit setting in my lap. When the 120 decibel alarm went off it was more than intense. If this thing goes off, your neighbor, their neighbor, and every floor in your apartment building will hear this alarm.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: David Chambers
Reviews.Content: Works at stated. Some parts of instructions could be better took a double of tries to get it to work as needed.

Reviews.Title: LOUD... did I say LOUD!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: BREA
Reviews.Content: holy moly these suckers are loud. Pretty sure I damaged my ear drums when I tested the alarm. ouch! I ended up putting tape over the speaker to muffle it a bit and it is still VERY VERY loud- but not ear damaging loud.  They work great! Exactly what I wanted. Easy to install, easy to program, easy to use.  I have a frame around my door and was worried after reading the reviews - but I had no problem lining them up correctly.  I installed the alarm on the actual door - and the magnet on the door frame. Cheap and easy way to keep track of who is coming and going.

Reviews.Title: Just a little more security for the home...
Reviews.Author: chris v martelle
Reviews.Content: This door alarm works great .. No problems installing or programing it.Tested  it many times and it  works every time.Shipping was fast and product was not damaged ..I use it on a daily basis.. I love it..

Reviews.Title: Good alternative
Reviews.Author: G. Head
Reviews.Content: If you don't want to spend monthly fees for an alarm service, this one will do well.  If someone enters your home it is ear piercing.  Easy to install and maintain.  We put them on doors (there is a package with window models too) originally because we are foster parents and had an elopement problem with a child.  These stopped that problem.  The child is no longer with us but my wife likes the nighttime security.  Have them on 3 exit doors.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install
Reviews.Author: Marie G. Maroney "Molly Woonsocket"
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install, nice and loud, I am disabled and I feel so much safer now.....the price was great. As a matter of fact my neighbor had me order her the same set and another one wants me to order him one...

Reviews.Title: Love it the alarm is very loud
Reviews.Author: Smain
Reviews.Content: This product is absolutely wonderful and I have enjoyed using it and I would recommend it to anyone do not hesitant to buy it.

Reviews.Title: Not working well
Reviews.Author: B. Brown "countrychix"
Reviews.Content: We are having major problems with the door alarm. Purchased two of them and both are doing the same thing. We thought at first it was user error but had other people look at them and they agree with us. You have to hold you mouth right to get them to chime. We are currently researching other options. We were trying to use them at my retail store and finally gave up on them.

Reviews.Title: Very Loud
Reviews.Author: RV guy
Reviews.Content: Was surprised at the decibel level of this little thing.  The delay is a bit long and you have to be a bit creative about mounting, depending on location and surface, but works well and is very loud, piercing  and annoying, which is what I was looking for.  The chime mode works well also, for letting you know the door was just opened, which would be good for business or child safety.

Reviews.Title: Ear piercing, but that's good!
Reviews.Author: vlnplyr
Reviews.Content: This Door alarm is great for those uses where you want to secure something, but don't want the expense of a complete security system.  The siren on this alarm is extremely loud, and the arming/disarming is fairly easy to understand.  However, it would be nicer if it gave voice prompts when arming so you could easily understand if it's armed or not.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly
Reviews.Author: Amaral
Reviews.Content: I also bought one for my mom and it works great. This can be used as a door alarm as well. Haven't used it as such just as a door chime but it works perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Sheila Varden Straffin
Reviews.Content: Very loud! Would be a good deterrent if someone broke in.I do worry that my cats would go deaf though...

Reviews.Title: Hard to set
Reviews.Author: Joseph J. Martos
Reviews.Content: The doorbell function worked well, but I had to reset the alarm function several times before it would go off every time. I still test it once a week to make sure it is working right.

Reviews.Title: Peace of mind!
Reviews.Author: M. A. Santiago
Reviews.Content: Ear peircing siren and a Hell of lot cheaper than a home installed system! Easy to install and ideal for a low crime neighborhood like mine. I'm a member of the NRA, and I believe this alarm will give me enough time to get my friends Smith & Wesson should the need arise! LoL

Reviews.Title: It Does the Trick!
Reviews.Author: Honest Abe "Lincoln"
Reviews.Content: Because I live in a city mid-rise with 90 units and nearly had my door bashed down by a resident who obviously was in maniac mode, necessitating me to call 911 before he did bash the door down for no good reason, I needed something to forewarn me should the door be forced opened. As it was, my door was not bashed down that night, but I still felt insecure knowing this maniac had done this similar thing to others in this building and still was allowed to live here.After reading the instructions, programming my code and listening to just the chimes alarm, I was impressed. My immediate neighbor was also affected that night by this maniac, so she asked me to order her this alarm as well, which I did at the same time I ordered mine. She is also happy with it, so the both of us do feel more protected.Unfortunately, in this day and age, you need all the protection you can get! This alarm certainly works well, is easy to install and operate and seems to forewarn people once they know that you have it. If they don't know you have it and try to enter illegally, well, I'm afraid they're in for a very rude awakening.Hey, it works for us!

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Max C Hart
Reviews.Content: We installed door alarm in utility building. Works very well and priced very reasonably. Code operated and easily installed. You want be disappointed with this alarm.

Reviews.Title: Once on the door the alarm won't come on.
Reviews.Author: CyberSaver
Reviews.Content: This thing only seems to work on the chime mode once placed on a door. The alarm works when it's in your hand, but once on the door, it doesn't work. What's the deal with that? I want the alarm to work because it will scare the crooks more than the chime will.

Reviews.Title: Works!
Reviews.Author: rubyoro0
Reviews.Content: Works very well. The Away/Alarm mode makes me want to run because it's so loud. I see why a burglar would want to run away too. Anyway, I purchased it mainly for my doors that lead to pool.

Reviews.Title: just ok
Reviews.Author: Ellzeena
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set up (unlike the radio shack one I have that I can't figure out how to work and has an 8 second entry delay, meaning it's going to go off every time).  Did not use hardware, self sticking works fine.  BUT....30 second delay is far too long for quick bust-the-door-in, grab and run types.  Alarm is loud but not anywhere near as ear splitting as the radio shack alarm, my apartment neighbors don't flinch when it accidentally sounds.  Basically, it's a deterrent because I have a small sign on my door that says "Door has alarm" and we have camera security in this building.  But honestly?  doesn't compare with the real alarm system in my house.  It's cheap, though, so worth a try.

Reviews.Title: Simple alarm for cheap price
Reviews.Author: RKS
Reviews.Content: It works as advertised. This is not the perfect solution for security but you could use on your door to the garage. Can't beat that price.

Reviews.Title: Works as described
Reviews.Author: Coffee Infusion "coffeeinfusion"
Reviews.Content: While our apartment was undergoing renovations we needed to schedule an extended stay at a local hotel. My biggest security concern was not for when we were present, but for when we were out of the room. Bought one of these for piece of mind. Sure, it's not a motion cam that alerts you or a security company via wireless or a wired phone, but it certainly beats the absence of any alternatives. Simple to use, and worked as advertised, and very affordable. For what it is, it's borderline 5 stars, but a product really has to be exceptional for me to rate it as such.

Reviews.Title: Very loud and obnoxious
Reviews.Author: Microfurby
Reviews.Content: This alarm does everything that it said it would. It's just not particularly good for homes because it is so loud and obnoxious. Easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: TA
Reviews.Content: This is a wast of money. After a week, the adhesive didn't stick and the alarm stopped working. Don't waste your money

Reviews.Title: wireless door alarm
Reviews.Author: Maggie the Cat
Reviews.Content: Didn't like it, it didn't work and I returned it.  The alarm went off when on our dining room table, but not when installed on the door.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: Sherri
Reviews.Content: Works perfect, using it for a teenagers door because they sleep walk, alarm sounds if door does open and really helps to check and see if shes sleep walking!! This alarm is loud also!! Thank you Amazon..

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: tilley
Reviews.Content: arrived quickly.it's simple to put up(tape or screws),EASY TO OPERATE(SIMPLE), LOUD, does the job!! i'm really satisfied with it. great price too.

Reviews.Title: Great product.
Reviews.Author: Amanda Wesley
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with this product. When the alarm sounds off it is very loud. I would recommend this product..

Reviews.Title: Watch Out Its Loud
Reviews.Author: Jared
Reviews.Content: This is easy to install.  The chime and alarm work really well.  If you have a need for knowing whats coming in and out the door the charm is a nice feature.

Reviews.Title: Works like it should
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: It is EAR piercing loud. My dog cries when it goes off. You WILL hear it when it does. its shrill.

Reviews.Title: Does not work....
Reviews.Author: Sarah Rapone
Reviews.Content: The alarm portion of the device does not work. I could only get the chime to work. Sounds like a regular doorbell.

Reviews.Title: Easy
Reviews.Author: Gecko
Reviews.Content: Very loud! It is a great thing if you are looking for a cheap and simple way to secure your doorway.

Reviews.Title: good for the $
Reviews.Author: Lil Bob
Reviews.Content: easily installed. sound pitch sufficient to scare intruder off  can be set for immediate alarm when door is opened giving time to grab your choice of self-defense.

Reviews.Title: Worked well for 9 months
Reviews.Author: Majic2930
Reviews.Content: Worked as advertised for almost nine months, then stopped. New batteries did not solve problem. 90 day warranty means it's a disposable product.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: pimpinpaige
Reviews.Content: Very loud... I am able to heard when my basement door is open.  The alarm is easily set and very very loud!

Reviews.Title: Works Like a charm: or an ALARM!!!
Reviews.Author: A-Dizzy1
Reviews.Content: Works Great.Really Loud, much louder than I expected.My neighbors all came out to see what was going on when my two year old tried to escape, while I was in the toilet room.I highly recommend this to anyone for any reason you might want it.

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: toby santini
Reviews.Content: this is a wonderful little item. The alarm is VERY LOUD ,loud enough to wake me and my sleepwalking husband. This was a very small price to pay , and this item really does exactly what it is supposed to do !

Reviews.Title: GE DE PUERTA
Reviews.Author: Nicola Cafaro
Reviews.Content: LO RECOMIENDO 100% MUY BUENO Y SUENA DURO, ES EL SEGUNDO QUE COMPRO, PIENSO COMPRAR OTRO ES MUY EFECIVO, POR LO TANTO, LO RECOMIENDO, GRACIAS.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Mor
Reviews.Content: This is a good product. It is exactly what I needed for a remote building. It works great and I will probably buy more.

Reviews.Title: Good product, VERY loud.
Reviews.Author: Wesley
Reviews.Content: The alarm is exactly as described. A good procuct for the price. I live in an apartment and have this on my entry door. The mount seemed like someone could easily remove it from the door, so I drilled a few holes in it and mounted it with larger screws. Also, the alarm is excessively loud. I'm not trying to wake the whole neighborhood up. I took an o-ring and siliconed it around the circular shaped speaker to quite it down a bit.

Reviews.Title: easy to set up
Reviews.Author: Dot
Reviews.Content: This door alarm was easy to set up and will provide warning if someone is coming in your door.  It has alarm and chime settings as well as home and away settings.  You can set your own 4 digit code.  It takes 3 AAA batteries.

Reviews.Title: It does the job
Reviews.Author: Sup
Reviews.Content: As of now the only part working is the door chime, which is good for what I need it for.

Reviews.Title: Missing a piece
Reviews.Author: Rollergirlajc
Reviews.Content: The alarm works fine, but it came without the mounting plate. We are going to try to use velcro. It is a good price and and it is just loud enough as a chime.

Reviews.Title: A-
Reviews.Author: G. J. Gibas
Reviews.Content: Great product, better price. Only difficulty was that it wouldnt take teh code to disarm the alarm for  a bit then worked.

Reviews.Title: great products
Reviews.Author: Nguyen
Reviews.Content: The product is great, it is loud and easy to setup. The material is good and nice design. Security code allows you to stop children from unexpected setting.

Reviews.Title: Great product for such a low price
Reviews.Author: Fred Bouclier
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. The batteries cost just as much but it's worth it. The alarm is really loud and can scare someone away.

Reviews.Title: WILL SCARE BURGLAR AWAY
Reviews.Author: the optimizer
Reviews.Content: When I was setting the alarm up and learning how it does what, I found that the alarm mode is so loud that it made me want to run away. So, I know that would shock the burglar. It was easy to set up but be prepared to cover with a pillow to deaden the sound or to wear protection of some sort while you are learning. I have yet to figure out the mode where the alarm will not go off when you go outdoors - but I can live with the annoyance of the so called "chime" as the alarm provides an extra sense of security with is worth its weight in gold.

Reviews.Title: Handy little alarm-- perfect for apartments!
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my apartment after there had been some burglaries on our floor. It is VERY loud in alarm mode and sounds like a typical burglar alarm. There is no mistaking that sound for anything else!! The chime mode is also considerably loud and sounds like a door bell -- "diiing dooong"! I like that it comes with double backing tape also because the screws for the magnet were too long for my door frame. It was pretty easy to set up and install but the only reason I am not giving 5 stars is because the alarm and the magnet have to be super close to work. Most door frames have ridges which made it a little tricky to set up without the alarm pad being literally right up along the edge of the door. Even so, it still works fine and doesn't interfere with opening and closing the door. I just wish it did not have to be so close to the edge.

Reviews.Title: Door alarm review
Reviews.Author: Dennis M
Reviews.Content: I bought this alarm mostly for a door that I almost never open. In the "home" position the alarm will go off as soon as the door is opened. In the "away" position it will go off after 30 seconds. I think this is too long. In 30 seconds I think that anyone breaking in has a lot of time to rip the alarm off the door and stomp on it. I would prefer that this alarm have remote controls to turn it on or off-like car alarms. That way it can always go off immediately when the door is opened. So if you have a door that you rarely use, I think that this alarm is okay.

Reviews.Title: Hurts my ears!
Reviews.Author: Buddy
Reviews.Content: This was easy to set up.The directions are very straight forward.Just make sure that the magnet and the alarm are CLOSE enough to be set-off.Keep in mind LESS than half an inch means they have to be awfully close.Other than that; the alarm works great! Nobody is getting into the house unless they break a window.Above all; I have chihuahuas ready to bit ankles off :)

Reviews.Title: Great Product!!
Reviews.Author: graneeejaneee
Reviews.Content: This is a great product!! Was soooooo easy to put on door.First put strip on left side of door frame. Then put the other part on the door.Tooooooo easy!!!!

Reviews.Title: fast shipping, great product
Reviews.Author: Y. Rivera
Reviews.Content: easy to use, easy to install, makes me feel more secure in my apartment. very loud so when you are testing in the home/alarm mode cover your ears!

Reviews.Title: Door Alarm
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: I love this but it will not meet code requirements for a pool alarm in my area which is why I purchased it.  I do like the chime and alarm options and could also be used on some windows/dog doors.  I will absolutely keep and use this for added peace of mind at night.  Alarm is loud enough to wake the dead.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: MoosieGirl
Reviews.Content: My mom lives alone and has my grandson stay with her on the weekends... he tends to sleepwalk and she was concerned that he would go out her back door and fall as she has a ramp back there to help her get in.  I purchased this for her and she LOVES it!  If anyone attempts to open that door when the alarm is set it WILL let her (and probably the neighbors know!) VERY Loud alarm and perfect for her situation.  GREAT Price for her peace of mind!

Reviews.Title: Works well in any mode!!
Reviews.Author: G. Demetrio Garrido Melgar
Reviews.Content: The only thing is that I wish it was a little harder to be able to dismount it, it takes like about 2 seconds to take it off your wall/door... but believe, it's really loud!!!

Reviews.Title: Horrible piece of junk
Reviews.Author: LadyMMO
Reviews.Content: It says on the back to press the learn button. Really? I searched and searched and never found a learn button. The number pad has 4 numbers only  1234 so you have to mix and match with just those.No instructions for mounting and I could see no way to attach the second piece.. I thought must have a magnet to break the connection?Got what I paid for.

Reviews.Title: These are simply awful.
Reviews.Author: KabulPickle
Reviews.Content: These seem like such a great idea.  I have had three and sent three back.  One simply went off randomly and couldn't be shut down.  ANother simply stopped working.  The third was missing screws.  You cannot tell if they are on or off.  Just opening the door becomes tricky because one cannot tell if the alarm will screech or not.  Do yourself a favor and do not bother.

Reviews.Title: DELUXE WIRELESS ALARM
Reviews.Author: Joseph Pirrello
Reviews.Content: EASY TO INSTALL- WORKS GREAT-IT SHOULD COME WITH BATTERYS-IT'S WORTH THE MONEY-WHEN IT'S ARMED IT SHOULD HAVE A LIGHT TO LET YOU KNOW IT'S ARMED.

Reviews.Title: Code noise too loud, alarm noise too quiet!
Reviews.Author: D. McMenamin "a homeschooler"
Reviews.Content: I would rather have quieter feedback when I am inputting the code to arm and disarm the alarm, and the sound of the alarm itself is too quiet. It is hard to tell by looking whether the alarm is armed or not. The adhesive for sticking it on your door is also a bit more flimsy than I would like.

Reviews.Title: It Stopped Working After 3 Months
Reviews.Author: sd
Reviews.Content: What a big waste of time and money.  I was happy in the first 3 months of using it but after it stopped working, forget it. The light would still show that it was set but if you open your door for even one hour, no alarm!

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect...
Reviews.Author: Myke
Reviews.Content: The door alarm is extremely LOUD, which makes them great alarms because they get everyone's attention! They aren't as good used as door chimes, unless you also want them to be incredibly loud :)Super easy to install, on both regular doors, as well as sliding glass doors... Just make sure you respect the less than 1/2" gap requirement.  The sensors even work when mounted perpendicular to the alarm.  To combat the ability of the bad guys to just yank them off and stomp on them, a screw just above the mounted alarm will seriously slow that process down (on the upside, they will probably have hearing damage by they time they find a screwdriver and get the screw out to remove the alarm box)I subtracted 1 star for the lack of ability to visually see if the alarm is set or not. it REALLY needs and LED indicator.The work around is simple but more time consuming: Set on AWAY/ALARM  Open the door and if it beeps and starts flashing red, it was armed, you have 30 seconds to shut it off  Open the door and nothing happens, the alarm was off.for an effective but affordable option these are still the best deal I have found, and have installed them in a few houses where break-ins were occurring in the neighborhood.

Reviews.Title: GE 45117 Deluxe Wirless Door Alarm
Reviews.Author: Mike Troth
Reviews.Content: It works great.  Had to add a shim under one door part because of door trim and door offset to much.  Was not a problem,  would of been nice if kit include included some spacers.

Reviews.Title: Just bought this
Reviews.Author: zosia
Reviews.Content: So far its been working great - if you set it for away you dont have to worry about the alrarm going off until you actually put in your code to activate it. So you can keep opening and closing the door with no issues....when you want to activate it you simply put in your code. to deactive it - you put in your code again. Super easy, but loud as hell (seriously could loose your hearing).

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: pinklady
Reviews.Content: Nice product but sent back. It will go off when you don't want it to, like when a package is delivered to your door and they lightly knock, or when the door is bumped lightly.

Reviews.Title: I returned it!
Reviews.Author: ndallguy "Blake"
Reviews.Content: For some reason, I could not get it to work properly and it could be my error, If I can remember, It did not fit right on my door and there is a magnetic sensor that would not attach flush to my wall so it's really not their fault. Sorry

Reviews.Title: Too dificult to set up.
Reviews.Author: L. A. Holiday "Hash"
Reviews.Content: The 4 digit alarm system doesn't work. You can put your 4 digit pick on inside, but when you use the digits to turn off machine during day, it will not turn off. We even had our neighbor, who is engineer try to set this thing. We use it as chime. It does chime every time we open door, but doubt it would awaken us at night. We bought 2 of these, & are thinking of returning them.

Reviews.Title: Just Chimes
Reviews.Author: W. Roos
Reviews.Content: I got this door alarm today, and it works great with the chime setting, but I have no alarm. Living in an apartment that was my main goal, however the chime sound is loud and crisp, so I will keep it. At this price it's still worth it.

Reviews.Title: Not Bad
Reviews.Author: Pdozie
Reviews.Content: Amazon wouldnt ship this item to Nigeria. I had to get them sent to an address in USA from where it was sent down to me. Got 3 of them. Working as per manufacturer's explaination.2 of down did hit the ground hard during installation but all still working. Nice product for the price

Reviews.Title: loud
Reviews.Author: H. Khan "Rich Highway Rider"
Reviews.Content: I would have given it 5 stars if this product had option of voice alert such as "door open" instead of obnoxious ring, which is often heard in stores.

Reviews.Title: cheap not worth it
Reviews.Author: Jessica Lu
Reviews.Content: it doesn't work as I expected. the alarm is LOUDDDDDDDDDDD but it doesn't work when i open or close the door

Reviews.Title: Bulky
Reviews.Author: Brenda King
Reviews.Content: Isn't what I was looking for, bulky. Buttons are had to push. Not impressed. Pretty expensive for a cheap item.

Reviews.Title: Easy to set up, built well and very loud for small door alarm.  It's okay
Reviews.Author: Paul Joseph Rice
Reviews.Content: Recommended if you'd like to only alarm one door, otherwise buy an alarm system from a installing company.  The basic unit here could be defeated in a couple minutes.

Reviews.Title: Think twice before buying !!
Reviews.Author: Tim Bailey
Reviews.Content: The mounting screws are JUNK !!! The heads strip at the slightest resistance . The placement of the sensor has to be exact ! The slightest bit off causes it not to work. The bracket on back of main unit ( if using screws ) causes main unit to stick out away from the door and pivot up and down, not very secure. This makes it very difficult to get the sensor in the right location. If you have molding around door, it requires cutting. Good luck.

Reviews.Title: Well Pleased
Reviews.Author: James Self
Reviews.Content: Am using as a chime and this unit is plenty loud where I can hear it from the other end of my retail store. Mounting tape installation was easy. Mounted chime unit on door just above head level to minimize sound of chime from direct ear shot and chance that a shoulder might dislodge taped unit or magnet. So far well pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: LisaLou9
Reviews.Content: Perfect for home protection of my small apartment.  I use it on the front door, works great and was easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Not loud enough
Reviews.Author: michael
Reviews.Content: The alarm is deafening. The chime is too soft. I wanted to know when my toddler opened the door to "escape". Other better options are available.

Reviews.Title: needs better on/off switch
Reviews.Author: Karen D Hakwins
Reviews.Content: It is very loud and I guess that is good,but no easy way to turn off for normal coming and going.  Only way that worked for me is to just take off the wall each time---- yuck!!!!  I didn't find the key pad useful at all.We use for basement doors, so we will hear if someone comes in, so they work well for that, but I wouldn't use for my most used doors.

Reviews.Title: Works good for the price.
Reviews.Author: Reindeer21
Reviews.Content: This GE Door Alarm is very simple and easy to install and use.  Goes up in a couple of seconds.  Sticks well.  Mine has been up for about 6 months and it is still in place.  Believe it or not I would like it to be a little louder.  I can hardly hear it in the other room with a fan going.

Reviews.Title: Okay, but not great
Reviews.Author: Richard M. Asbill
Reviews.Content: It is a little awkward and unarrtactive on my door. My spouse thought it looked "tacky" and decided to take it down.

Reviews.Title: Should be louder And LESS than 30 seconds to disarm
Reviews.Author: Snowman
Reviews.Content: Alarm works good but as soon as you enter it beeps and intruder can easily remove the batteries after hearing the beep. It's also not as loud as my cheaper instant door alarms from GE.

Reviews.Title: Good starter alarm
Reviews.Author: M. Suarez "prettyface"
Reviews.Content: This is a good alarm, it serves the purpose.  I bought it so i can use it when we go on vacation and alarm my neighbors if there is a break in in my house.  however, the alarm is not loud enough for them to hear.  it is loud for me to hear while inside my house but not for the neighbors to hear.  I wish it was louder.  The chime is loud enough for me if i am in the first floor of my house but when i go to the 2nd floor with my bedroom door close, i can hardly hear it.  it is good enough for the price i pay, I'm okay with it.

Reviews.Title: Good but mounting hardware is bad
Reviews.Author: Island School
Reviews.Content: These alarms are pretty good. I have them installed around my school to deter petty theft. They are nice and loud, easy to program, easy to remember the code. But the screws that come with the set are made out of something between low grade ore and high grade dirt. I have stripped at least two of every pack of four. I'm not using power tools and I'm predrilling the holes in wood and metal. I'm a big dude but I'm no He-Man so I shouldn't be stripping these screws using a tiny screwdriver (00 if anyone is interested). I've also used different screwdrivers so I know I don't have some diamond tipped drivers.TL;DR Unit is great but the mountings screws are trash.

Reviews.Title: lack of infoOn the website
Reviews.Author: agogage
Reviews.Content: on the website the picture nor the description were accurate. They left out the fact that it comes with a magnetic bar that has to be placed on the door jam. My doorjam is 1/4 inch out from the door resulting in nonfunction for this product.

Reviews.Title: Works pretty good, but dont buy it from this site
Reviews.Author: J. Su
Reviews.Content: GE 45117 works pretty well in the first week. After first week the keypad is somehow hard to press the numbers. Strongly suggest buying from local retail store so if there is any problems you can exchange the item. Maybe I am just bad luck received a defect one.The alarm mode allows you 45secs to leave your house and 30sec to disable the alarm. 30 sec is a little bit too long for me. I guess whoever break in the house can easily took something and leave when the alarm sound....

Reviews.Title: Dissapointing
Reviews.Author: csmith
Reviews.Content: Pretty cheaply made, it is loud and work as described. I'd recommend paying a little more and getting something else of higher quality.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: plantqueen
Reviews.Content: It served its purposes, it is a door alarm, it works that's it. No need for a further comment.  That's all.

Reviews.Title: Performance/Batteries
Reviews.Author: BimPrincess
Reviews.Content: Since my first review, we installed & are using this product &  bought a second one for another door.  The chimes are loud and so alert you to the fact that someone has entered or left.  I originally bought it for the door leading to our backyard and have since added one to another door.Very easy installation.I still think that the description should include - uses 3 AAA batteries.No where on the product page does it say that you need 3 AAA batteries.  I have lots of AA in the house, no AAA.  Have to wait until I go out, hope this product does what I am expecting it to do.

Reviews.Title: Loud as hell!
Reviews.Author: Wark
Reviews.Content: So I wanted to know if someone was breaking into my apartment at night or to deter them if I was out. I knife through the impossible plastic armor and start programming the thing. This bastard is LOUD. I'm pretty sure any of the sounds this thing can make would wake my neighbors--even the 'chime.' Can't return it, as I became enraged when frightened by its operating volume and threw it against the plaster wall. Oh well. Cheap, though. Buy something else if you want to break electronics, however.Oh, and pressing the buttons results in the most unpleasant button-depressing experience possible; they are hard, hard to press, and they click when they are fully depressed. And they're loud!Also, I can't put screws in my damn wall, which renders this device difficult--bordering on impossible--to install in my apartment.TOO LOUD!

Reviews.Title: What you see isnt what you get
Reviews.Author: D. Null
Reviews.Content: Notice up in the description, mentioned not once but twice it says that this device features a 'home' and 'away' mode to kick the alarm off immediately or have it wait. I specifically bought this unit for that feature. I was sure surprised when this showed up today and found that this item doesn't actually have this functionality. So, if you are looking for a door alarm that has an instant on or delay function, regardless of what Amazon says, this unit isn't for you. Now I get to go through the fun of returning this thing.

ProductInfo.Features:
Easy to install and requires no wiring
Door alarm uses four-digit keypad to set security code for arming/disarming
120-decibel deluxe door alarm with keypad for peace of mind
Alarm delay feature avoids false triggering
Features away and home mode
ProductInfo.Name: GE 45117 Deluxe Wireless Door Alarm
